item.description:
A while back we had a great photo meetup for a moonrise over the Isles of Shoals from Hampton Beach. Tonight we’re getting even better conditions for a repeat performance. 
Tonight’s moonrise is just after sunset (by 9 minutes) and the skies will be clear so the colors should be fantastic.

The water and air temperatures will be very close so the near horizon distortion due to temperature inversion should be minimal.

Finally, the distance from tonight’s location to the Isles of Shoals is about half that from Hampton Beach.

The Meetup starts at 7:30PM, but moonrise is shortly thereafter at 7:45PM, so try to get there early to allow for traffic, parking, setup, and replacing the battery you forgot was drained.

Google Map here:  https://maps.google.com/maps?q=43.011826,-70.737748&num=1&t=h&z=17&iwloc=A

Dress warm as it may be breezy and a little chilly. I don’t expect bug spray is necessary, but you never know.

Contact me (Kevin) at 603-556-8387 if you cannot find us.
item.name: Moonrise Meetup Tonight
